page.title: 18A day in my life
page.content: {Helen Sturdy's} Today it is Saturday.My weekend begins!I get up at 7.30am.and have a lovely warm shower.After that I get dressed and go into the kitchen. Then I go outside and feed Smartie,my rabbit.Afterwards I have my breakfast.I have cornflakes which are crispy flakes of corn.Then I go up to the field next to our house and ride my neighbours pony.Yum,yum dinner time.After dinner I get ready to go to cricket with my dad.(Cricket is a game played with a bat and ball.The object is to score as many runs as possible.Then when it has finished,at home I have my supper,for my supper I have some crisps,(thin,crispy slices of potato),And a cup of tea(tea is a drink made from teabags or tealeaves and hot water.At 10.15 I go to bed.
